short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides ads in the GMail Preview Pane labs feature and expands the email view to fill that space.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides ads in the GMail Preview Pane labs feature and expands the email view to fill that space.
